post.title: I'm seriously curious: where did niggers come from, according to the Bible?

body:
Racist slur aside, that's no different than asking where "crackers" came from — or blondes, or blue eyes, or red hair, or people whose second toe is longer than their big toe, or literally any other physical trait found in human beings. All of the genetic information for all of the amazing variability we see in human physiology was there from the beginning.

As people groups spread (from the tower of Babel) and then became isolated from one another, some of that genetic diversity was lost in individual groups; in some areas that might mean that the genes for high-melanin-content skin got lost while in other areas the genes for low-melanin-content skin got lost while in other places it kind of stayed somewhere in the middle.

We can see the exact same process all over nature. Compare chihuahuas and great Danes, where did they "come from"? They came from the same place; humans intentionally bred out the genes for large size in the former, and just the opposite in the latter, but all of that genetic information was already present in the earlier dog kind that humans started with. It's important to note here that this is always a result of a _loss_ of genetic information which extends not to just appearance, but also "robustness" (disease resistance and the like), and this is why "mutts" _tend to_ be healthier, smarter, longer-lived dogs.

body:
Gog and Magog is most likely a reference to Rome or Persia. It's hard to say because the details change between the First Temple, the Second Temple, Beta Israel, and the Book of Revelation. 

But in the oldest form we can be sure of, Ezekiel 38 IIRC, Gog is a man and Magog is his land, and they're painted as an anti-Messianic figure. In the Book of Revelation it's right in the middle of a diatribe on Satan and the Roman Empire, so it's most likely about Nero and his successors coming against God with the full force of Imperial authority.

post.title: I'm seriously curious: where did niggers come from, according to the Bible?

body:
An interesting series to watch is "The New History of the Human Race" by Answers in Genesis who interview Nathaniel Jeanson. 

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=xP297DOy-Pc&list=PL1v9pqs4w1mwrGlCET76Rs99Fx0EfJXE4&index=1

Nathaniel has done a lot of studying in genetics and history to attempt to come up with a clear picture of where all people groups came from. And it looks like all people groups seem to be related from white to black to yellow and even to neanderthals.

His work seems to support the Biblical claim that all people in the world are related to a common ancestor in Adam, and later in Noah.

Now if you are wondering why they are black, there are a couple of theories for this. Here are two

1. Hundreds of years of living in such a hot and sunny area could result in progressively darker kids who can withstand the heat better.

2. Darker skinned people might prefer warmer climates and would migrate there instead of cold places like Europe, and then those dark genes would be come dominant
